lead_paragraph: LEVY--Theodore "Teddy," age 83, beloved husband of Joyce. Loving and caring father to children Adam, Debbie and Jon. We will always remember him. Our love to the family. Norman and Rosalie Chalif 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEVY, THEODORE "TEDDY," AGE 83

snippet: LEVY--Theodore "Teddy," age 83, beloved husband of Joyce. Loving and caring father to children Adam, Debbie and Jon. We will always remember him. Our love to the family. Norman and Rosalie Chalif 1/3
